titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a bill relating to the Omnibus Drug Initiative.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-861.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 363 - 41 (Record Vote No: 281).

bill.summary: 8/10/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of a bill relating to the omnibus drug initiative.
